5-night Male Colombo Cruises from Kochi, October 2026

mobileImages.altTag: New Year Cruise, Year End Vacation, NYE Party
Lakshadweep Cruises, India, Mumbai, Goa, Kochi
5-night Male Colombo Cruises from Kochi, October 2026

overview.title: Sail Into A World That Dreams Are Made Of
overview.subTitle: What you seek awaits you here. Come aboard for an extraordinary experience that goes beyond cruising.

testimonials.comment: Recently went on a voyage with Cordelia from Chennai to Vishakapatnam with a family of forty. Overall, the experience was awesome and the hospitality.
Amazing! Can't even justify the experience aboard this city on the sea! You will find everything that you could possibly need. Good music plays round the clock.
I opted for the Goa-Lakshadweep-Mumbai cruise and had a wonderful time with Cordelia. Delicious food, superb hospitality, cooperative staff, and super clean accommodations.

info_section.title: A Voyage Beyond An Ordinary Cruise
info_section.sub_title: Indulge in lavish accommodations, exciting entertainment, exquisite dining, and much more.

info_cards.title: Entertainment
info_cards.sub_title: From exclusive entertainment shows at the Marquee Theatre to enthralling live music, mesmerising magic shows and professional theatrical performances. We have endless entertainment to enchant you throughout your stay.

info_cards.title: Dining Venues
info_cards.sub_title: Savour the delightful culinary journey of our onboard dining experience.

info_cards.title: Activities
info_cards.sub_title: Savour the delightful culinary journey of our onboard dining experience.

info_section.title: A Voyage Beyond An Ordinary Cruise
info_section.sub_title: Indulge in lavish accommodations, exciting entertainment, exquisite dining, and much more.

info_cards.title: Entertainment
info_cards.sub_title: From exclusive entertainment shows at the Marquee Theatre to enthralling live music, mesmerising magic shows and professional theatrical performances. We have endless entertainment to enchant you throughout your stay.

info_cards.title: Dining Venues
info_cards.sub_title: Savour the delightful culinary journey of our onboard dining experience.

info_cards.title: Activities
info_cards.sub_title: Savour the delightful culinary journey of our onboard dining experience.

testimonials.comment: This vacation spot is a true oasis! It allowed me to disconnect from the world and cherish quality time with my family. The incredible shows and activities were absolutely worth it. The rooms were comfortable, and the staff was exceptionally helpful.

Had a wonderful time on Cordelia! It's an experience of a lifetime! Amazing food👌🏼 Superb hospitality! Great staff and affordable deals. Thoroughly enjoyed my stay and would love to travel to another destination on Cordelia Cruises.

We had an amazing 5-day trip to Lakshadweep! The staff was excellent, there were activities for all ages, fantastic shows, clean rooms, delicious food, and breathtaking views. It was one of our best trips so far!

info_section.title: The Best cruising Experience
info_section.sub_title: Lavish accommodations, delightful activities, unlimited entertainment, the finest dining, and much more.

info_cards.title: Onboard Experiences
info_cards.sub_title: Indulge yourself in a plethora of blockbuster shows to make for a perfect seacation.

info_cards.title: Accommodation
info_cards.sub_title: Wake up to breathtaking views await you every morning while you sail to a different location every day.

info_cards.title: Destinations
info_cards.sub_title: A cruise vacation with Cordelia Cruises takes you to some of the most gorgeous Indian and international destinations.

info_cards.title: Food & Beverages
info_cards.sub_title: Dwell into the delightful experience of our onboard dining. Our restaurants and bars are simply unmissable.

info_cards.title: Wedding
info_cards.sub_title: Embark on a special journey to solemnise your auspicious wedding vows in the middle of the gorgeous ocean. Let the wedding vows meet the ocean views on the most beautiful travel destination in India.

info_cards.title: Entertainment
info_cards.sub_title: From exclusive entertainment shows at the Marquee Theatre to enthralling live music, mesmerising magic shows and professional theatrical performances. We have endless entertainment to enchant you throughout your stay.

info_cards.title: Corporate
info_cards.sub_title: Take your corporate events, meetings and incentive trips to the next level onboard the Empress. Cruise to gorgeous destinations with your team for the perfect offsite.

testimonials.comment: This vacation spot is a true oasis! It allowed me to disconnect from the world and cherish quality time with my family. The incredible shows and activities were absolutely worth it. The rooms were comfortable, and the staff was exceptionally helpful.

Had a wonderful time on Cordelia! It's an experience of a lifetime! Amazing food👌🏼 Superb hospitality! Great staff and affordable deals. Thoroughly enjoyed my stay and would love to travel to another destination on Cordelia Cruises.

We had an amazing 5-day trip to Lakshadweep! The staff was excellent, there were activities for all ages, fantastic shows, clean rooms, delicious food, and breathtaking views. It was one of our best trips so far!

overview.title: Discover The Jewel Of The Indian Ocean
overview.subTitle: Embark on a once-in-a-lifetime journey to Sri Lanka's stunning East Coast. Discover the Unmatched Charm of Jaffna, Hambantota, and Trincomalee as you immerse yourself in the rich history, exotic sights and breathtaking beauty of Sri Lanka.

ports.name: Hambantota

shoreEx.name: Walk through Galle Dutch Fort and Wander Around
Experience River Cruise & Turtle Hatchery Visit

ports.subTitle: Embark on an adventure in Hambantota and explore the breathtaking wildlife at Yala or Udawalawe National Park. Visit the turtle hatchery farm for a truly unique experience.

ports.name: Jaffna
ports.subTitle: Indulge in a peaceful beach retreat, discover sacred temples and shrines, and connect with your spiritual side in Jaffna.

ports.name: Trincomalee

shoreEx.name: Relax at the beach - Cinnamon Blu

ports.subTitle: Don't miss out on a chance to see dolphins and whales up close! Immerse yourself in this tropical paradise as you explore world-class water sports.

portsInfo.title: Sri Lanka At Its Finest
portsInfo.subTitle: Uncover Sri Lanka's rustic charm, thrilling safaris, water sports, and rich culture as you experience a world of wonder on this exotic island nation.

testimonials.comment: This vacation spot is a true oasis! It allowed me to disconnect from the world and cherish quality time with my family. The incredible shows and activities were absolutely worth it. The rooms were comfortable, and the staff was exceptionally helpful.

Had a wonderful time on Cordelia! It's an experience of a lifetime! Amazing food👌🏼 Superb hospitality! Great staff and affordable deals. Thoroughly enjoyed my stay and would love to travel to another destination on Cordelia Cruises.

We had an amazing 5-day trip to Lakshadweep! The staff was excellent, there were activities for all ages, fantastic shows, clean rooms, delicious food, and breathtaking views. It was one of our best trips so far!

info_section.title: Sail In Style And Comfort
info_section.sub_title: Embark on a journey like no other with Cordelia Cruises. Enjoy premium amenities on board as you take unforgettable excursions to the stunning shores of Sri Lanka.

info_cards.title: Exquisite Cuisine
info_cards.sub_title: Get ready to savour mouthwatering summer dishes while enjoying breathtaking views of the ocean. We've handpicked the best flavours of the season to tantalise your taste buds.

info_cards.title: Premium Accommodations
info_cards.sub_title: Relax and unwind as you sail to Sri Lanka's east coast. The Empress and its crew will provide you with exceptional hospitality throughout your journey.

info_cards.title: Exciting Destinations
info_cards.sub_title: Set out on an unforgettable summer vacation as you explore new and exciting destinations with your loved ones on our India to Sri Lanka cruise.

info_cards.title: Endless Entertainment
info_cards.sub_title: From exclusive entertainment shows at the Marquee Theatre to enthralling live music, mesmerising magic shows and professional theatrical performances. We have endless entertainment to enchant you throughout your stay.

info_cards.title: Destination Wedding
info_cards.sub_title: Embark on a special journey to solemnise your auspicious wedding vows in the middle of the gorgeous ocean. Let the wedding vows meet the ocean views on the most beautiful travel destination in India

info_cards.title: Corporate Events
info_cards.sub_title: Take your corporate events, meetings and incentive trips to the next level onboard the Empress. Cruise to gorgeous destinations with your team for the perfect offsite.

info_cards.sub_title: Embark on a special journey to solemnise your auspicious wedding vows in the middle of the gorgeous ocean. Let the wedding vows meet the ocean views on the most beautiful travel destination in India.

info_cards.title: Entertainment
info_cards.sub_title: From exclusive entertainment shows at the Marquee Theatre to enthralling live music, mesmerising magic shows and professional theatrical performances. We have endless entertainment to enchant you throughout your stay.

info_cards.sub_title: Take your corporate events, meetings and incentive trips to the next level onboard the Empress. Cruise to gorgeous destinations with your team for the perfect offsite.

overview.title: Discover Dunes To Dazzling Heights In Dubai
overview.subTitle: Experience the allure of Dubai as you venture into the captivating realms of sand shifts to skyscrapers. Immerse yourself in vibrant cultures, and ancient wonders, and create extraordinary memories as you sail to this enchanting corner of the world.

ports.name: Dubai

shoreEx.name: Dune bashing, camel riding and quad biking

ports.subTitle: Unleash your inner adventurer amidst towering skyscrapers and luxurious shopping experiences with our exciting Dubai cruise packages.

portsInfo.title: Cruise to Dubai
portsInfo.subTitle: Experience unparalleled elegance and comfort with Cordelia Cruises as you embark on remarkable voyages to the captivating harbour of innovation.

testimonials.comment: This vacation spot is a true oasis! It allowed me to disconnect from the world and cherish quality time with my family. The incredible shows and activities were absolutely worth it. The rooms were comfortable, and the staff was exceptionally helpful.

Had a wonderful time on Cordelia! It's an experience of a lifetime! Amazing food👌🏼 Superb hospitality! Great staff and affordable deals. Thoroughly enjoyed my stay and would love to travel to another destination on Cordelia Cruises.

We had an amazing 5-day trip to Lakshadweep! The staff was excellent, there were activities for all ages, fantastic shows, clean rooms, delicious food, and breathtaking views. It was one of our best trips so far!
